title: Debt
description: Haley Pritchard, a simple nurse on her way home is kidnaped. Three brothers... One had been shot... She was to save his life. He wasn't the problem, the problem was the injured man's brother, promising her that unless she saves his brother's life, he will kill her... Cedrick Hudson made Haley shiver with fear. His presence alone was enough to make her want to hide. Not only was he pressuring her to save his brother, his interest in her turned into more than just needing her help as a nurse. He wanted way more from Haley and her fear of his wrath was enough to allow him to do whatever he wanted to do with her...  WARNING: This book is recommended for mature readers 18 years and over. It contains material of sex and submission and violence.
author: E.L. Beth
